diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Post-ERCP pancreatitis, ESBL E. coli bacteremia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient experienced epigastric pain immediately after an ERCP procedure, which worsened and spread to bilateral lower quadrants. She also reported nausea and dry heaves. CT examination revealed acute peripancreatic fluid collections, leading to the diagnosis of post-ERCP pancreatitis.
